binding engine first removes any that may have been added to the attached property of the bound element. 它接著會檢查是否有任何自訂定義該，在此情況下它會呼叫方法在每一份s，直到其中一個執行發生錯誤，或直到它們全部都通過之後。It then checks if there are any custom s defined for that , in which case it calls the method on each of the s until one of them runs into an error or until all of them pass. 2. 未通過的自訂規則後，繫結引擎會建立物件，並將它加入至繫結元素的集合。Once there is a custom rule that does not pass, the binding engine creates a object and adds it to the collection of the bound element. 當不是空的附加的屬性的項目設為`true`。When is not empty, the attached property of the element is
